topic.title: ItemView Vs TokenView
topic.shortdesc: The section here brings out the differences between ItemView and TokenView

row.entry: Token view is the view dedicated for each token. The token view will show the user full details of each token, including the actions associated with the token.
Item view shows only the key relevant attributes associated with a particular type of token, such as balance, network, issuer, expiry etc.
